root: ^Colette: Hi there! My name's Colette! How can I help you today?
^Colette: Are you looking for any book in particular? Are you here to return something? Just here to browse?
^Colette: Whatever it is, I'm here to help!
^: Uh, hi... I'm here to return this.
^: Not entirely sure, but it says on the back it's from this library.
^Colette: Oh, hmmm... Well, it sure does say it's from here, but I don't think I've ever seen this issue before.
^Colette: I've never heard of this author before, which is strange cuz I've been pretty up to date on new releases...
^Colette: I've got a thing for superhero fantasy, teehee!
^: Could you have a look around?
^Colette: Yeah, for sure! It is a big library and I don't know everything, hehe!
^Colette: Thanks! You can look around if you want while I try to sort this out.
^Colette: I'll make sure to find out more about this comic. I'll give it my 100 and 10%!
